name: Sudoku - Number Puzzle Game
description:
Sudoku – one of the greatest games of all time.

Train your brain by filling in the blanks in this superb logic puzzle. With five difficulty levels, intelligent note taking and hints, our version of Sudoku for iPhone and iPad is for complete beginners and Sudoku professionals alike. The advanced grid generator guarantees a never ending supply of fresh Sudoku puzzles and will keep you busy for days.

-unlimited gameplay (Sudoku Grid Generator)
-5 levels of difficutly (easy to insane)
-3 beautiful board styles
-automatic game save
-advanced input methods
-intelligent note taking functions
-highscore system and time taking

The game is fully localized and supports the following languages: Deutsch, English, Français, Español, Italiano, 汉语, 日本語
